Copy the content below and paste on your GitHub release.

Note that only merged Pull Requests will appear on the body.

--

Suggested tag: `%{time}`

Suggested PR title: `Release Notes %{time}`

```
## Changes on this release:

**PR 306** - **Latest unreleased PR** *powered by Felipe Piacsek*



ATTENTION: There are tasks to be performed BEFORE deploying:

- Send an e-mail to the manager




ATTENTION: There are tasks to be performed AFTER deploying:

You should run the migrations
after
the

server restart.



## Contributors on this release:

Thanks a lot for your contributions:

Author's Name | Author's Email
------------- | --------------
Felipe Piacsek | felipe.piacsek@gmail.com


```
